channel.title: Hurrah noob questions! =D
channel.description:
Ok lol noob MoparScape questions. If you read my other thread you would already know I'm trying to create a server. Ok so here we go!
1. I can't mage. How can I fix this? 2. What programs should I dowload to create a server? 3. Re. 2: Where can I get these programs? 4. How can I set ancient magicks to the extra tile next to friends list? 5. How do I summon objects?
These may all require some stupid program. >_> More questions. Please answer these too:
6. Monster Health? Non-existant. How can I fix this? 7. Monster drops? 8. How can I make NPC's not ONLY face north? 9. How can I make npc's walk around? 10. How do I make Admin crowns appear next to names? 11. How can I make the Trollheim Teleport teleport me to TzHaar caves in Karamja volcano?
ALSO: Don't post here saying, "Learn to code, noob." Or any of that crap. Actually tell me if you've got an answer. Yes, I am a noob. Not going to deny it. Thanks!
[right]~~Hemnoith~~[/right][br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 05:34:26 PM[/size][hr]Ok any mod, please close this thread, no replies. =/

item.title: Hurrah noob questions! =D
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

Alright a couple of these i can answer right off my head, but the rest you should look for tutorials…

  1. ::pickup ITEMID AMT so for a blue phat ::pickup 1043 1
    you can get a full list of item IDS from the mopar client…by going to “help” item IDS

  2. Go into your autospawn.cfg… If it says use a program, go to “open with” and then other… notepad…

Find the NPC ID and location u want to change… and edit the mobility of the NPC… for instance

spawn = 535 3252 3439 0 0 0 0 0 2 fairy keeper in dummys

now look at the one below… There are no 0’s… 0s indicate no movement… The coords you can find out from hitting f4 when your on your server…

spawn = 535 2338 3185 0 2338 3185 2338 3185 2 fairy keeper in admin zone

Read full topic
